feed.title: Category: Puppy | Dark Matter in Cyberspace

entry.title: Using Wireless Lan in Puppy Linux
entry.content: Welcome -> Internet Connection -> connect -> Internet Connection Wizard -> Connect to Internet by: Wired or wireless LAN -> Simple Network Setup -> wlan0 -> select your wireless hotpoint in the list(ESB for example), Encryption: WPA, then enter password in “Key” textbox -> click “CONNECT”.
